If my website doesn’t make at least $100 a month I can’t keep it up and my 11 year long project is dead. Help me out, friends
This is very true. Everything you want to learn about any art or craft is freely available on YouTube. The problem is, you then have to do the work, which is the sticking point for many.

Apparently there was an extra dialogue that allowed to give Shadowheart the noblestalk mushroom in act 1. Ugh, missed that too! 😭
I just saw this on BF, and I’m…. I wonder if you can give her noblestalk??? I already used up mine, and that save is too far to redo 😭
Maybe go just because it’s already scheduled?

the batstarion prototype is done!! I can't understate the amount of joy he sparks 💖 (also my cats keep trying to eat him) 

#bg3 #astarion #batstarion #crochet #handmade
Peter x Miguel, Crazy how I never posted this

I spent last two months telling myself that I need to sit down, need to buy tickets, need to look at the date of this thing with purpose of memorizing it, and not just keeping the vague ‘sometime in spring’ in my head. Gods, what a shit start of a day…

Fuck. My adhd brain that’s incapable of plan or prepare for anything, didn’t plan or prepare for a whole ass convention that I really wanted to go… That was last weekend. Neil Newbon was fucking 25 minutes drive away from me… I dunno… I’ve forgotten food in a fridge before, but a whole con?
Aaa!!! He’s so cute!!!🥰

Why can’t BG3 be a harem game. I want to romance all the characters 😭
I’m my head, I’m already decided Halsin will bang her. Or she would bang Halsin ^^

💛🖤
Astarion will not disapprove of freeing the pixie if he’s the one to free her. It also makes more sense why he gets so happy and giddy after that.

They are napping ^^ I feel like it’s going to take some time for Astarion to get used to actually share a bed with somebody (also, Durge does a neck scratchy and looks around) I will eventually redo the screenshots, cause this was taken on phone camera from steam deck 😂
All the shadowhearts I drew last month. I've been pretty absent over the past month, but I've been making stuff all the same! I'll start posting more regularly again this week! 💜
*Slowly and carefully slides an idea of Alistor/Lucifer in your direction, while looking all innocent*

Tieflings' tails are part of their love language and Lunaris has a very expressive tail ♥

#Astarion #BG3 #baldurgsgate3

So to have this scene between them just going to make responding to Astarion’s confession with “I care about you, deeply” so much more honest 😭 plus, both of them realizing they had feelings for each other in the same night is just… *chef’s kiss*

In fact, the last few interactions, it was exactly the opposite, where Resist Durge really needed somebody to support him, because it was obvious how heavily his urge was weighing on him, and he was only getting mocked by Astarion in return.

I know I’m like a broken record, but I’m so very happy I got the Durge murder scene before his confession scene. Because so far there had been ample opportunities for Astarion to develop feelings for Durge, but nothing really for Durge to develop feelings in return.
Ohh… is that your first durge run?
Oh? I didn’t know… kinda curious now 👀
So worth it!!!
rerolling until I fail xD
I’m like a maniac, giggling past my bedtime, because I’m trying to lie to Fel that I don’t care about Astarion and rolling with a disadvantage because “you’re in a romance with this character” xD
I want to fail the “I don’t care about him” deception check 👀
Omg, I just did!!! I got the murder Astarion before his confession!!! But how I wonder, is Durge ready to use the L word just yet? 🤔

Ordered a cocktail for $10, and I think they forgot to put alcohol into it… it didn’t taste like there was anything, but I thought maybe it’s one of those you can’t taste and then it hits you, but no… nothing… not even a hint… I mean, it was a yummy drink, but not 10 bucks yummy 😭

Sybille is here to wish you a cheery weekend 📣

#Orc #Art

I really can’t remember if there’s any other genuine interaction Astarion would have with you before the confession… I’m craving for just a sliver of him showing some sort of real emotion before that.
Astarion sitting there, giving pep talk to tied up Durge just felt very climactic for Durge falling in love with him 🤔
I wonder if you can trigger trying to kill Astarion scene before the confession scene 🤔
Best interaction with his majesty xD I’m going to headacanon Dragonborn purr xD
Yes, durge, you’re so funny xD
Oh, the magic tower in the underdark. At the left bottom of the map. The dog’s grave is in the place the bullet attacks you.
Dog collar you find if you dig a grave near the tower 👀
Ok, headcanon time. Vampire Spawns get sharp claws for nails.  Astarion have them too, but he files them daily to look like normal nails.
The man lives off pizza and strawberry sundaes and somehow manages to look this good 😂

Watched Hazbin Hotel, and... it was... an experience, alright.

Loved radioapple interactions.

I relate to Lucifer in many ways, and Alastor is just such a fun character!
Plus it’s not traditional for Dragonborn to pick their own mates,  so I honestly think Astarion hadn’t had a lot of Dragonborn lovers, if any… 🤔

Also, Dragonborn have extremely tight knit communities, even if living outside their homeland, so it would’ve been very risky for vampires to hunt them. Surely, there might’ve been random Dragonborn sailors that from time to time could go missing, but still.
Honestly, Wyll looks the best in that dress out of the entire party …  😏
BG3 fanart. Wyll. I'm glad we all agreed on the wavemother's robe 💦 🎨 #bg3

Apparently there’s a book in BG3 that talks about Dragonborn mating and it states they have retractable genitals… But the character creator options don’t reflect it… 😩 I was disappointed how their peens looked in the game, but it’s even more disappointing to know the actual game lore contradicts it

Going to redo the Jaheira scene tomorrow, but gonna bring Karlach with me. Because if Karlach will go into a fangirl mode, Durge’s attitude will immediately change from “that bitch is threatening me” to “Jaheira = friend”
It was a challenge to stay in character and not start attacking Jaheira 😭
Hmm…. True…. But… my durge just wanted to stab them xD
Yes, I know, it was an experience for many people! It was a confusing thing xD
This is the way xD

PRINCESS. RAGE!!! 

D20 Dungeons and Drag Queens was such a blast. Love all the queens, and their characters are iconic!!

one day I'll finish my portraits of the other three 😤

#dnd #dndart #dndcharacter #dimension20

Me: complaining how difficult the fight with Nere was to my husband.
Him: weird, it was very easy to me. Were you helping the Druegar so they would join you in the fight?
Me: … no?
I’m sorry, they are slavers and cruel to animals. But, most importantly, they were rude to me xD
This is the single funniest thing that an algorithm has ever done.
To be honest, I really think Larian did a good job staying away from hyper masculinity as ideal…
sleep time for me too uwu #halsin #makiart #baldursgate3

Yeah, sad that they removed the part from the original shirt with the poem. I love how it also said “not a stranger to thread and needle”… I remember Larian was promising new in camp idle animations, would be so nice if they have Astarion start embroider at his tent 👀
Barcus is one of the best characters is bg3, and I feel sorry for all the people who accidentally sent him flying on that windmill. I desire to pet him on that bold head 😂
I just realized I CAN shoulder throw him! This felt good xD
lol, yes, she does xD

I just wanted to pick up a mushroom, didn’t want to trigger this stupid dialogue xD there are very few instances that I honestly desired to shoulder throw him to the ground and that was one of them.  😂 Lae’zel is so done with both of us…
Let it be a lesson to anyone look over your shoulder xD

There are different lines for whatever the collar was in the backpack or on the neck. I can’t stop pressing the wearing one, the horny way Astarion delivers the line just kills me xD
Loki (tv). Classic Loki. Repost for the skyline as I am counting down the days before a good chunk of my life presumably becomes all things Loki again.

BG3 fanart. Wyll. 🎨 ...guess I'll just hyperfocus and finish this in one sitting. I ended up doing more color than I expected, but I like it.

Blizzard, please stop doing too many time skips. Thrall is a character that has been aging with me since I’ve been in high school, when I met him for first the first time in Warcraft 3, and I really don’t want to see him die in my time 😭
“Carmilla Carmine” from Hazbin Hotel is without a doubt my new favorite #hazbinhotel #carmillacarmine #carmilla #fanart #art #digitalart #musashden #drawing #timelapse

Also, instead of me picking an option that he would disapprove of and then vandalizing the portrait to even it out, I decided than him slipping away to vandalize the portrait while I was dealing with the egg was more in character for both of us. Look how proud he looks xD
Still the biggest sin of this game was not letting me to keep the githeyanki baby.
Thank you for that!!! :D

We are a certain kinda people, the Star lovers.
Lmao!!!!
I feel you!!!!! 😂
He probably still expects you to make advances, at least on some level 😢
Oh yeah, it’s so sweet 🥲 I won’t be able to let him go, but it is probably the sweetest option ❤️
Yes, I mean that it’s possible you can skip it if you don’t know better. Like if you play the first time, and have no idea what to pick, it’s possible that he’s never explained his trauma.

Well, I feel that Astarion specifically wanted to experience intimacy, including physical, just without sex. So, sweet kisses, holding hands, hugging and snuggling. At least that what I gathered after watching and rewatching every possible outcome of every dialogue choice on YouTube 🤔
Well, you have an excuse to play one more time xD

This run im gonna first talk to Araj, get the conversation about his trauma. Then reload and get the sweet confession and pretend it was all a part of the same thing. (Will have to do the Araj conversation again, but oh well) 😂

There absolutely had to be an option to do both, tell him you don’t need to have sex and hug him… I’m also sad you can’t have both the high approval confession and the dialogue after Araj, because depending on choices he might not even talk about his trauma or about his feelings for you😭

Astarion’s alignment at the beginning of the game is Pathetic Evil, actually. #BG3 #Astarion

So now I play the default Durge, who’s messed on the head but ultimately trying to be a better person, and I honestly enjoying this play through so much more. He’s not a cookie cutter hero, he feels so much more alive and real because of it.

My first 2 play through I played as a paladin half orc who was kind and noble, and always doing the right thing. And then I found out Durge was canonically cannibal and necrophile and I just couldn’t see these two things applied to my orc.

Yes, I lost 6 hours of progress due to a glitch, but now my Durge gets to murder the entire Zhentirim hideout!!! Because I had two kill the two guys in the cave the last time, they didn’t find out that I had their cargo, so they didn’t order me to return it, and I had no reason to start a fight :D

Mobile games be like, oh, you missed an opportunity to recruit a character you like? That’s ok, you can just buy him, fully geared for ALMOST AS MUCH AS THE ENTIRE GAME HE CAME FROM! Or you could wait 170 days for the next event ☺️

I really wish Durge could’ve been a companion, so I could have an Astarion origin run and have extra romance scenes. Then again, he’s an incredibly messed up character, and you don’t touch a lot of that if you play as him and resist the Urge, but it might’ve needed flashing out if he was a companion

I wish I could fix Gortash… like, can I not kill him and not make Karlach mad at me at the same time? 😭

I feel so sorry for Gortash. Your family sells you, but you work hard and make something out of yourself, you meet a guy, you come up with a plan to take over the world, but then you think he died and mourn him, only for him to come back with no memory of you, a new lover, and intent to kill you…

Back to drawing, and since I’m neck deep in Pathfinder 1E (again) I drew my catfolk urban bloodrager, Ano Clovermark!
